World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 29 日星期一 07:26:47 GMT 120
China, HK sign arrangement on reciprocal recognition of civil, commercial casesChina's Supreme Court and Hong Kong's Department of Justice said on Monday that they signed an arrangement on the reciprocal recognition and enforcement of judgements in civil and commercial cases effective immediately in both places. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:21:44 GMT LDM347DUZVLKRBA34TBD4X5P6E https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-hk-sign-arrangement-reciprocal-recognition-civil-commercial-cases-2024-01-29/Reuters世界中国
France wants EU law changes 'this week' to help protesting farmers -ministerFrance wants a decision this week to change EU nature law regulations regarding agricultural surfaces which have to remain fallow under new biodiversity rules, in order to help the country's farmers, said French farming minister Marc Fesneau on Monday. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:08:57 GMT 2SRCQVUQAVPNXCJAQCHWFV5FUY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/france-wants-eu-law-changes-this-week-help-protesting-farmers-minister-2024-01-29/Reuters世界欧洲
First deadly strike against US forces since Gaza war startedThree U.S. service members were killed and at least 34 wounded in a drone attack by Iran-backed militants on U.S. troops in Jordan, said U.S. President Joe Biden, the first deadly strike against U.S. forces since the Israel-Hamas war erupted. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:02:39 GMT 2RKTL5H445KARIEDGBQE7EP5KE https://www.reuters.com/world/first-deadly-strike-against-us-forces-since-gaza-war-started-2024-01-29/Reuters世界
Pope says Africans are 'special case' when it comes to LGBT blessingsPope Francis said in an interview published on Monday he is confident critics of his decision to allow blessings for same-sex couples will eventually understand it, except for Africans who are "a special case". Mon, 29 Jan 2024 06:56:22 GMT 5PRCIIJOPZKWBECI7FZAPU74MI https://www.reuters.com/world/pope-says-africans-are-special-case-when-it-comes-lgbt-blessings-2024-01-29/Reuters世界
China, Papua New Guinea in talks on policing, security cooperation - ministerPapua New Guinea is in early talks with China on a potential security and policing deal, Foreign Minister Justin Tkachenko told Reuters, weeks after deadly riots in the South Pacific nation's capital. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 06:52:41 GMT EOR2VLI22NLJLOLLYZQSAXAGQA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-papua-new-guinea-talks-policing-security-cooperation-minister-2024-01-29/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
Global watchdog proposes new ethics code to combat greenwashingFirms that check environmental, social and governance claims made by companies will be asked to follow a proposed new ethics code to help combat greenwashing, the chief of a global standards body told Reuters. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 06:09:30 GMT CWRLI3JFANNVTHEUYVPRDMOQU4 https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/global-watchdog-proposes-new-ethics-code-combat-greenwashing-2024-01-29/Simon Jessop, Huw Jones可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Political pressure builds on Biden to strike Iran after US deathsThe killing of three U.S. troops and wounding of dozens more on Sunday by Iran-backed militants is piling political pressure on President Joe Biden to deal a blow directly against Iran, a move he's been reluctant to do out of fear of igniting a broader war. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 06:07:15 GMT CK33STU7MZPM5ATO7JMGL3DHHM https://www.reuters.com/world/political-Pressure-builds-biden-strike-iran-after-us-deaths-2024-01-29/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali世界
Malaysia's outgoing king wants govt stability, bigger role for future monarchsMalaysia's King Al-Sultan Abdullah has called for government stability, warning that the country risked losing investors and falling behind its competitors due to prolonged political turmoil. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 06:04:09 GMT PM3PSWAYFNOMTCDX2QUKXTAPJE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/malaysias-outgoing-king-wants-govt-stability-bigger-role-future-monarchs-2024-01-29/Rozanna Latiff世界亚太地区
Iran executes four people it says are linked to Israeli intelligence -state mediaIran carried out the death sentences of four people on Monday that it says were linked to an Israeli intelligence operation, after the Supreme Court rejected their appeal, Iranian state media reported. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 05:16:14 GMT LOTO5VZLK5NVVOMETJMWNKCMVU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-executes-four-people-it-says-are-linked-israeli-intelligence-state-media-2024-01-29/Reuters世界中东
Anti-Muslim incidents jump in US amid Israel-Gaza warComplaints of anti-Muslim and anti-Palestinian discrimination and hate in the U.S. rose by about 180% in the three months after Oct. 7 following Hamas' attack on Israel and Israel's subsequent assault on Hamas-governed Gaza, an advocacy group said on Monday. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 05:03:32 GMT 6MYQIEIFWBKWFEZY4N7AYAFDSI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/anti-muslim-incidents-jump-us-amid-israel-gaza-war-2024-01-29/Kanishka Singh世界美国
Philippines' Marcos says maritime cooperation a cornerstone in Vietnam visitPhilippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on Monday said talks on maritime cooperation between his country and Vietnam would be one of the cornerstones forged in a strategic partnership with its Southeast Asian neighbour. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 04:54:29 GMT LWNO4W6T6ZMVBDLO6GKW7YESEE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-marcos-says-maritime-cooperation-cornerstones-vietnam-visit-2024-01-29/Reuters世界亚太地区
